title: Suhana Khan, Agastya Nanda to celebrate New Year at Shah Rukh's farmhouse? Rumoured couple spotted together in Alibaug - Hindustan Times
summary:
Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda Spotted Together in Alibaug, Rumored to Celebrate New Year's at Shah Rukh's Farmhouse

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Suhana Khan, daughter of Shah Rukh Khan, and Agastya Nanda, grandson of Amitabh Bachchan, were recently seen in Alibaug, leading to speculation about their relationship as they plan to celebrate New Year's together.

  • Suhana and Agastya have been previously spotted together, prompting dating rumors.
  • The pair was caught on video by fans while enjoying a walk and boarding a speed boat.
  • Suhana wore a stylish outfit while Agastya sported casual attire from his brother's brand.
  • The duo is rumored to welcome the New Year at Shah Rukh Khan's luxurious farmhouse in Alibaug.
  • Both are set to make their film debuts after starring in Zoya Akhtar's upcoming project, The Archies.
“If reports are to be believed, Suhana and Agastya are all set to ring in the New Year together in SRK's farmhouse.”

The sighting of Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda has stirred excitement among fans, hinting at a blossoming romance as they prepare for their cinematic debuts.
newTitle: Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda Spotted Together in Alibaug, Rumored to Celebrate New Year's at Shah Rukh's Farmhouse

title: Salman Khan's Sikandar teaser release postponed to Saturday after Manmohan Singh's demise - Hindustan Times
summary:
Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Release Postponed After Manmohan Singh's Death

Publication Date: Dec 27, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

On the occasion of Salman Khan's 59th birthday, the teaser launch for his upcoming film Sikandar was set for today but has been postponed following the death of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.

  • The teaser was scheduled to be released at 11:07 AM on December 27, 2024.
  • The production house confirmed the postponement via their official social media handle.
  • Manmohan Singh passed away at age 92 due to age-related medical issues.
  • Singh was Prime Minister of India from 2004 to 2014 and was a significant figure in India's economic policy.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed to 28th December 11:07 AM.” - Team Sikandar

The portrayal of Salman Khan in Sikandar sparked excitement among fans, with further details expected to be shared on the new teaser release date.
newTitle: Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Release Postponed After Manmohan Singh's Death

Telangana CM Revanth Reddy announces Cabinet sub-committee 'to resolve problems of Telugu cinema' amid Pushpa 2 case - Hindustan Times
summary:
Telangana CM Revanth Reddy Announces Cabinet Sub-Committee for Telugu Cinema Issues

Date: Dec 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Chief Minister Revanth Reddy recently addressed members of the Telugu film industry, outlining significant measures to support its growth and prosperity amidst ongoing controversies.

  • A Cabinet Sub-Committee will be established to address the concerns of the Telugu film industry.
  • Film producer Dil Raju appointed as Chairman of the Film Development Corporation (FDC).
  • Government issued special orders for eight films and provided police grounds for filming Pushpa-2.
  • CM Reddy emphasizes promoting eco-tourism and temple tourism as part of industry support.
  • Criticism arises from BJP leader Amit Malviya regarding the government's alleged targeting of Tollywood.
CM Reddy stated, "A Cabinet Sub-Committee will be constituted to resolve the problems of the Telugu film industry."

The Telangana government's response aims to enhance support for the local film industry and address ongoing challenges, promoting Hyderabad as a competitive hub for film production.
newTitle: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy Announces Cabinet Sub-Committee for Telugu Cinema Issues

5 OTT releases to watch this week: Singham Again, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, Squid Game season 2, and more - Hindustan Times
summary:
5 OTT Releases to Watch This Week: Singham Again, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, and Squid Game Season 2

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This week offers a mix of exciting OTT releases, including new seasons of popular series and the digital release of hit films. Here's a guide to what’s streaming this week.

  • Squid Game (Season 2) - Netflix: The long-awaited follow-up to the hit series begins streaming on December 26, featuring familiar faces and new deadly games.
  • Singham Again - Prime Video India: Ajay Devgn returns as DCP Bajirao Singham, on a mission to rescue his kidnapped wife, streaming from December 27.
  • Doctors - JioCinema: A medical drama starring Harleen Sethi and Sharad Kelkar, exploring ambition and personal conflicts, streaming on December 27.
  • Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 - Netflix India: This horror comedy, starring Kartik Aaryan, mixes humor with thrills, streaming from December 27.
  • Your Fault - Prime Video: A sequel exploring the challenges faced by a couple against family opposition, based on the Culpables trilogy, streaming from December 27.
“An exciting week for OTT viewers with various genres ranging from horror to medical drama.”

This week features diverse genres for all tastes, giving viewers a lot to choose from as many popular titles return to the screen.
newTitle: 5 OTT Releases to Watch This Week: Singham Again, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, and Squid Game Season 2

title: 'Baby John' box office collection Day 2: Varun Dhawan starrer crashes with Rs 4.5 crore collection; 'Push - TOI Etimes
summary:
‘Baby John’ box office collection Day 2: Varun Dhawan starrer crashes with Rs 4.5 crore collection; ‘Pushpa 2’ emerges highest-earning film on Thursday

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

The box office performance of 'Baby John' saw a significant drop on its second day of release, collecting only Rs 4.5 crore, while 'Pushpa 2' surpasses it as the highest-earning film.

  • 'Baby John', starring Varun Dhawan, experienced a poor box office showing.
  • It collected just Rs 4.5 crore on its second day, indicating a collapse in earnings.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has emerged as the leading film in terms of box office performance on Thursday.
“The box office performance of ‘Baby John’ has disappointed fans and critics alike.”

This stark contrast in box office numbers indicates a strong competition in the film industry, with audiences gravitating towards ‘Pushpa 2’ over new releases.
newTitle: Baby John box office struggles as 'Pushpa 2' takes lead.

  • Her makeup was minimal, featuring glossy pink lips and a soft blush.
  • Her hair was styled in a half ponytail with soft waves, enhanced by new face-framing bangs.
